main_definition: Centuries refer to a period of 100 years, or alternatively an idiom that signifies something spans over a long duration.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit of time equaling 100 consecutive years.
meanings_and_examples.example: The Renaissance lasted from the 14th to the 17th centuries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In an idiomatic expression, it is used to denote a very long period or duration of time.
meanings_and_examples.example: They have been friends for several centuries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A reference point in history that spans over 100 years from the start date mentioned.
meanings_and_examples.example: The Industrial Revolution began in the late 18th century and continued into the 19th centuries.
